colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI RTZA BRGYUD PA'I GZHUNG LAS LEN PA, DE NI SHIN TU PA'I PHYIR, DE LAS CHUNG RGYAS NAS GAB GYI BZHES, ,AE TI NI TZAS SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYABAS NAN GTAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO MCHOG GAR GNYIS PA SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA'I BLO B ZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BYUR RGYAL DU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA LA LHA CHAGS SOGS PA'I NYIS SKYONG THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DAR CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUNG BRTZE BAS BZONG BAR DZING DU GSOL, ,GAL DE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA NGES BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DENG NAS BYANG CHUB THOB KYI BAR DU LAM BZANG GI SKYE DANG BAR CHOD KUN BZLOG PA'I GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
